TEXT.TITLE: KELLOGG CO <K> 3RD QTR NET
TEXT.BODY: Shr 96 cts vs 83 cts Net 119.3 mln vs 102.8 mln Revs 1.01 billion vs 869.9 mln Nine mths Shr 2.53 dlrs vs 2.01 dlrs Net 313.6 mln vs 248.5 mln Revs 2.83 billion vs 2.52 billion NOTE: 1986 nine month earnings include nonrecurring loss of 9.9 mln dlrs, or eight cents a share, from purchase of 123.7 mln dlrs principal amount of the company's 150 mln dlr 12-1/4 pct debentures due February 15, 2015. Reuter
